title: SET_VEHICLE_ROLL_BIAS
content:
0x264B45DE// SetVehicleRollBias
void SET_VEHICLE_ROLL_BIAS(Vehicle vehicle, float value);Parameters:vehicle: Target vehicle.value: Roll bias value.Set the vehicle's roll bias. Only works on planes.
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleRollBias
void SET_VEHICLE_ROLL_BIAS(Vehicle vehicle, float value);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_ROLL_BIAS
SetVehicleRollBias(vehicle, 0.0)
